draft.subject: Invitation: SCCCI Annual Business Outlook Forum 2026
draft.email_blurb:
Dear Secretariat,

We invite you to the SCCCI Annual Business Outlook Forum 2026 on February 4, 2026. Gain critical insights into the economic landscape for the year ahead, free for members or $20.00 for non-members. Please register your attendance via the link below.
draft.whatsapp_text: SCCCI Annual Business Outlook Forum 2026: Feb 4, 9 AM - 12:30 PM. Gain vital insights for the year ahead. Free for members, $20 for non-members. Register now: https://forms.office.com/r/w4ErtY32yV

event.description_preview: Annual Business Outlook Forum 2026 February 04, 2026 - February 04, 2026 (add to calendar) 09:00 AM - 12:30 PM Non-Member Price : $ 20.00 Member Price : Free Share Click Here To Register Join this event

draft.subject: Invitation: SCCCI Tech Symposium 2026 (Jan 21-22)
draft.email_blurb: We invite you to the SCCCI Tech Symposium 2026, a key event for staying ahead in technological advancements. Join us on January 21-22 from 10:00 AM - 05:00 PM at the SCCCI Auditorium; SCCCI members attend for free, non-members at $20. Secure your spot now and register via the link below.
draft.whatsapp_text: SCCCI Tech Symposium 2026: Jan 21-22, 10 AM - 5 PM at SCCCI Auditorium. Explore key tech trends. Free for SCCCI members, $20 for non-members. Register here: https://www.sccci.org.sg/user/event/registerEvent/sccci-tech-symposium-2026

event.description_preview: SCCCI Tech Symposium 2026 January 21, 2026 - January 22, 2026 (add to calendar) 10:00 AM - 05:00 PM Location : SCCCI Auditorium, 47 Hill Street, Singapore 179365 Non-Member Price : $ 20.00 Member Price : Free Share * This is a physical attendance only event. * * If you encounter any issues with your registration, please reach out to Mr Chris Foo via chris@sccci.org.sg * For any other enquiries, please reach out to Mr Chris Foo via chris@sccci.org.sg . The event confirmation will be sent out 3 days prior to the event, if not earlier. in event of overwhelming response, priority will be given to SCCCI Members. ** There will not be any refund after sign-up, unless event is postponed/cancelled by organiser. Participation in Morning Session is mandatory for access to Afternoon Breakout Workshops

draft.subject: Free Event: Unpacking Customer-centricity for Growth & Innovation
draft.email_blurb: SCCCI invites you to a complimentary session on 'Unpacking Customer-centricity for Growth and Innovation'. Discover actionable strategies to enhance business growth and innovation, free for all attendees on November 21, 2025, 10:00 AM - 12:00 PM. Register now to secure your spot.
draft.whatsapp_text: Join SCCCI for a free session: Unpacking Customer-centricity for Growth & Innovation. Learn key strategies for business growth. Nov 21, 2025, 10 AM - 12 PM. Limited spots. Register now: https://forms.gle/9Lo7mw1wpqr9gjMS7

event.title: Unpacking Customer-centricity for Growth and Innovation

draft.subject: SCCCI Business Mission to China (Shanghai, Nanjing) - Nov 2025
draft.email_blurb: Invite your members to the SCCCI Business Mission Trip to China (Shanghai, Nanjing) from November 5-8, 2025. This mission offers unique opportunities for market exploration and networking. Please encourage them to register by 15 October to secure their participation.
